```{r echo=FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
s3 <- arrow::s3_bucket("neon4cast-forecasts/parquet/aquatics/model_id=flareGLM/reference_datetime=2023-02-24", endpoint_override = "data.ecoforecast.org", anonymous = TRUE)

d <- arrow::open_dataset(s3) |> collect()
```

```{r}
d |> 
  filter(site_id == "BARC",
         variable == "temperature") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = datetime, y = prediction, group = parameter)) +
  geom_line()

```
